dlentry.dt: How can I improve the general pipeline performance?
dlentry.dd: You might improve performance by increasing the batch size used by the pipeline. The batch size determines how much data passes throught the pipeline at one time. By default, the batch size is 1000 records. When

p.draft-comment: From Hari: Output data is not as expected [some fields are missing or have unexpected value or even type [expected integer but got string]].Trouble shoot by previewing and stepping through stages [data debugging :)].
